price: Say, “Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Mighty Throne?”
arabic: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul man rabbu al-samāwāti al-sabʿi warabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
